data.convo: I can't believe Mr . Fro didn't buy it . Who does that guy think he is anyway ? Bill Gates ? He had a lot of nerve telling us our ads sucked . Time to order . Balista , today I want a skinny triple latte . When did you start worrying about your weight ? I'm not . I just don't feel like drinking whole milk today . Why ? Do you think I'm fat ? No , Jess , chill out !
